issues.description: Port mapping is 5000:5000 instead of 5000:80 as specified in the assignment. This works fine for development (app listens on 5000 internally) but differs from the typical pattern. This is acceptable since the runtime stage uses port 80.

Uses .NET configuration binding format (double underscores like LLM__Provider) instead of the PRD-suggested names (LLM_PROVIDER). This is actually better for ASP.NET Core and is well-documented in the file.
